thread.title: Man pleads not guilty to accessory charge in Mojave mass shooting | News | bakersfield.com
thread.title_full: Man pleads not guilty to accessory charge in Mojave mass shooting | News | bakersfield.com

author: MELANIE NGUYEN mnguyen@bakersfield.com
title: Man pleads not guilty to accessory charge in Mojave mass shooting | News | bakersfield.com
text:
After weeks of delays due to the defendant’s medical unavailability, the man suspected of providing a gun to the suspected Mojave mass shooter pleaded not guilty to all charges.
Jonathan Steven Hernandez is charged with one count of attempted murder, three counts of possessing a firearm as a felon, one count of possessing ammunition as a felon, possessing an assault rifle, one count of shooting at an inhabited home, one count of carjacking and one count of accessory.
